Develop the ability to heal from any illness or injury at an accelerated rate. This would improve my overall health and wellbeing, allowing me to live a longer and healthier life. It would also reduce healthcare costs and improve the quality of life for individuals who suffer from chronic conditions.

Gain the power of telekinesis. This would enable me to manipulate objects with my mind, eliminating the need for physical effort and reducing the risk of injury from accidents. It would also be a useful skill in emergency situations, allowing me to move objects quickly and efficiently.

Possess the ability to travel through time. This would allow me to witness historical events firsthand, learn from the past, and potentially alter the course of history. It would also provide me with a greater sense of perspective and appreciation for the present moment.

Become invisible. This would give me the ability to observe situations without being noticed, allowing me to gather information and learn from people and environments without interfering. It would also provide a sense of anonymity and privacy.

Gain the ability to create reality with my thoughts. This would allow me to manifest my desires and bring them into existence, giving me greater control over my life and circumstances. It would also be a powerful tool for creating positive change in the world.
